arcs.name: East Blue
arcs.description: The beginning of Luffy's adventure to find the One Piece.

arcs.name: Alabasta
arcs.description: The crew travels to the Alabasta kingdom to help save its princess and defeat Crocodile.

arcs.name: Sky Island
arcs.description: The Straw Hats discover the island in the sky and challenge the god Enel.

arcs.name: Water 7
arcs.description: The crew seeks a shipwright and uncovers the secrets of the world government.

arcs.name: Enies Lobby
arcs.description: The Straw Hats invade the judicial island to rescue Nico Robin.

arcs.name: Thriller Bark
arcs.description: The crew faces off against ghostly creatures and the Warlord Gecko Moria.

arcs.name: Sabaody Archipelago
arcs.description: The crew arrives at Sabaody and faces the Eleven Supernovas and Admiral Kizaru.

arcs.name: Fish-Man Island
arcs.description: The Straw Hats arrive at Fish-Man Island and confront the New Fish-Man Pirates.

arcs.name: Dressrosa
arcs.description: The crew battles against Doflamingo in a country of toys and terror.

arcs.name: Whole Cake Island
arcs.description: The Straw Hats infiltrate Big Mom's territory to rescue Sanji.

arcs.name: Wano Country
arcs.description: The Straw Hats join forces with the samurai to take down the shogun Orochi and Kaido.
